help_messages.name_service:
A quick scan of the directory.
WARNING!
A file name and size matching does
not guarantee that the  file is a
duplicate. Be careful when using
this method, some files may be
mistakenly marked as duplicates.

Recommended to compare file by
hash sum.
help_messages.md5_service:
Recommended option.
Optimal balance between scanning
speed and search quality.
Comparison of files by MD5 hash sum.
help_messages.sha_service:
Slight increase in quality
(compared to MD5) but more time
consuming.
Comparison of files by SHA256 hash sum.
help_messages.sub_folders:
If enabled, all sub-folders
will be scanned.
If disabled, only the current
directory will be scanned.
Default ON.
